subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Nets, who started flat on offense and appeared uninterested on the defensive side of the ball, lost to one of a Timberwolves team that was missing its two best players.
snippet: The Nets, who started flat on offense and appeared uninterested on the defensive side of the ball, lost to one of a Timberwolves team that was missing its two best players.
